content: Hey I’m new here I was wondering I m getting int ham radio operating and I’ve been seeing a lot of developer talk and wondered if anybody knew anything about hacking int firmware
I’m wanting to expand the frequency range of my baofeng uv-5r
you are in the wrong place for this question

you are in the wrong place for this question

But I bet we could model it with a FHIR Communication resource! :p
At least it's on the social stream

I wasn't sure whether to shut it down. It's slightly outside the typical convention of what to do for fun in conjunction with a FHIR-related event, but I wasn't sure how tight we wanted to be on FHIR-related in some way.
Well, I have a ham radio license (KD7ATQ) - and I know what he is talking about. :)
